titlStmt.titl: Protocol for systematic reviews on risk factors and preventive interventions for post Covid-19 condition

stdyInfo.abstract: This is a protocol for systematic reviews on risk factors and preventive interventions for post Covid-19 condition, conducted in collaboration with the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) and the Canadian Agency for Drugs and Technologies in Health (CADTH)
